mapper.insert: insert into user (nickname, phone, password, photo, sex, balance, prestige, reg_date) VALUES (#{user.nickname}, #{phone}, #{user.password}, #{user.photo}, #{user.sex}, #{user.balance}, #{user.prestige}, #{user.reg_date})
mapper.select: select id, nickname, phone, password, photo, sex, balance, prestige, reg_date from user where id = #{id}
